styling.contentHtml:
Applies a keyframe animation to an element.

Valid values

  • This property is completely compatible with CSS animation. Note that only the shorthand property can be used at the moment. Separate properties like animation-duration cannot be used.
styling.title: Animation

styling.contentHtml:
Remove default styling from elements which have it, such as button, input and toggle. This allows styling those element more accurately if desired.

Valid values

  • Keyword values: none or button
styling.title: Appearance

styling.contentHtml:
Plays audio in certain situations. This property is unique to React Unity and does not exist in web CSS.

Valid values

  • The property must have the format <url> <delay> <iteration-count | infinite>
    • Example: url(res:click) 400ms 1 - Meaning to play the resource named click after 400ms delay once
    • Example: url(res:ambiance) infinite - Meaning to play the resource named ambiance on an infinite loop
styling.title: Audio

styling.contentHtml:
Sets the background color of a component.

Valid values

  • Known color name: red, limegreen, transparent
  • Hex color: #a5a5a5, #777, #00ff0033
  • RGBA color: rgba(23, 16, 168, 0.3)
  • CSS keywords: inherit
styling.title: Background Color

styling.contentHtml:
Sets the background image of a component.

Valid values

  • Url value. Examples:
    • From web address: url(https://via.placeholder.com/350x150)
    • From resources: url(res:images/ui/exampleImage)
    • Data url: url(data:image/png;base64,9j4AAQSkZJRgABAQEBLAEsAAD...)
styling.title: Background Image

styling.contentHtml:
Changes the border color of all sides of the element's rectangle.

Alternatively, each side can be set separately with the following properties:

  • border-top-color
  • border-right-color
  • border-bottom-color
  • border-left-color

Valid values

  • Known color name: red, limegreen, transparent
  • Hex color: #a5a5a5, #777, #00ff0033
  • RGBA color: rgba(23, 16, 168, 0.3)
  • CSS keywords: inherit
styling.title: Border Color

styling.contentHtml:
Changes the border radius of all four corners of the element's rectangle.

Alternatively, each corner can be set separately with the following properties:

  • border-top-left-radius
  • border-top-right-radius
  • border-bottom-right-radius
  • border-bottom-left-radius

Valid values

  • Pixel values: 12px, 0, 24px etc.
  • Percentage values: 50%, 20% etc.
styling.title: Border Radius

styling.contentHtml:
Changes the border width of all sides of the element's rectangle.

Alternatively, each side can be set separately with the following properties:

  • border-top-width
  • border-right-width
  • border-bottom-width
  • border-left-width

Valid values

  • Pixel value: 0, 5px, 20px etc.
styling.title: Border Width

styling.contentHtml:
Creates a box shadow of the target element.

Valid values

  • Standard syntax: offset-x | offset-y | blur | spread | color | inset?
  • Extended syntax: offset-x | offset-y | blur-x | blur-y | spread-x | spread-y | color | inset?
styling.title: Box Shadow

styling.contentHtml:
Sets the text color inside a component.

Valid values

  • Known color name: red, limegreen, transparent
  • Hex color: #a5a5a5, #777, #00ff0033
  • RGBA color: rgba(23, 16, 168, 0.3)
  • CSS keywords: inherit
styling.title: Color

styling.contentHtml:
Adds content to text elements and pseudo elements :before and :after.

Valid values

  • String value enclosed in quotes: "Hello world!"
styling.title: Content

styling.contentHtml:
Sets the mouse cursor texture when an element is hovered. Compatible with CSS syntax.

Valid values

  • A named cursor: default, none, pointer etc.
  • An image with hotspot offset: url(res:myCursorImage) 12 6
styling.title: Cursor

styling.contentHtml:
Sets the mask image of a component.

Valid values

  • Url value. Examples:
    • From web address: url(https://via.placeholder.com/350x150)
    • From resources: url(res:images/ui/exampleImage)
    • Data url: url(data:image/png;base64,9j4AAQSkZJRgABAQEBLAEsAAD...)
styling.title: Mask Image

styling.contentHtml:
Changes the opacity of an element and its children.

Valid values

  • A number between 0 and 1: 0, 0.72, 1 etc.
  • Percentage: 40%, 100% etc.
styling.title: Opacity

styling.contentHtml:
Allows an element and its children to ignore pointer events.

Valid values

  • Keyword values:
    • auto or visible: allow pointer events only when the element is visible
    • all: always allow pointer events
    • none: ignore all pointer events
styling.title: Pointer Events

styling.contentHtml:
Rotates the element around its transform-origin.

Valid values

  • Single angle value to rotate around Z-axis: 45deg, 1.2rad, 0.5turn etc.
  • 3-dimensional angles in the form eulerX eulerY eulerZ: 45deg 60deg 360deg etc.
styling.title: Rotate

styling.contentHtml:
Scale the element around its transform-origin. Does not affect the layout.

Valid values

  • Single number to scale uniformly: 0.8, 1.6 etc.
  • 2-dimensional value in the format scaleX scaleY: 1.5 2 etc.
styling.title: Scale

styling.contentHtml:
Affects the pivot point for scale and rotate. By default it is at the center.

Valid values

  • Positional keyword: top, right, bottom, left, center, top left etc.
  • Pixel value: 50px 20px
  • Percentage values: 50% 20%, 40px 50% etc.
styling.title: Transform Origin

styling.contentHtml:
Allows gradually changing a CSS value when it changes.

Valid values

  • This property is completely compatible with CSS transition. Note that only the shorthand property can be used at the moment. Separate properties like transition-duration cannot be used.
styling.title: Transition

styling.contentHtml:
Repositions the element without affecting its layout.

Valid values

  • 2-dimensional pixel amount or percentage: 40px 50px, 50% -50%
styling.title: Translate

styling.contentHtml:
Completely shows or hides the element.

Valid values

  • Keyword values: visible or hidden
  • Boolean true for visible and false for hidden (in JSX)
styling.title: Visibility

styling.contentHtml:
Allows showing certain elements in front of others.

Valid values

  • Integer values: 0, 100, 762 etc.
styling.title: Z-index
